channel.title: Comments on: Hashing It Out #34: Storj – Shawn Wilkinson & JT Olio

item.title: By: Matt Tarca
item.dc:creator: Matt Tarca
item.description: I am pro Storj. Constructive feedback as a fan: stop saying you are just S3 compatible. One rule of startups is that if you are not 10x better than your competitor on some dimension then it is not worth doing. I think Storj is attempting be equivalent to S3 but to win on cost. If so, double down on that and stop being shy about it. Good luck. -a storj supporter
item.content:encoded: I am pro Storj. Constructive feedback as a fan: stop saying you are just S3 compatible. One rule of startups is that if you are not 10x better than your competitor on some dimension then it is not worth doing. I think Storj is attempting be equivalent to S3 but to win on cost. If so, double down on that and stop being shy about it. Good luck. -a storj supporter
